transforms.code:
# Format and sort the names 
	formatted_names = sorted([{"value": item["id"], "label": item["name"]} for item in value],key=lambda x: x['label'].lower())
	return formatted_names

config.script:
txId = system.db.beginTransaction(timeout=5000)
	
	try:
		
		# Get all the parameters we need to save
		edit							= self.view.params.edit
		updated_by						= self.session.props.auth.user.userName
		line_id							= self.view.params.line_id
		site_id 						= self.view.params.site_id
		system_id 						= self.getSibling("System_Dropdown").props.value
		line_name						= self.getSibling("Name_Entry").props.text
		line_description				= self.getSibling("Description_Entry").props.text
		supply_temp_transmitter 		= self.parent.getChild("Settings").getChild("SupplyTransmitter").getChild("temp_tag").props.params.selectedTag
		supply_flow_transmitter 		= self.parent.getChild("Settings").getChild("SupplyTransmitter").getChild("flow_tag").props.params.selectedTag
		supply_cond_transmitter 		= self.parent.getChild("Settings").getChild("SupplyTransmitter").getChild("cond_tag").props.params.selectedTag
		supply_press_transmitter 		= self.parent.getChild("Settings").getChild("SupplyTransmitter").getChild("press_tag").props.params.selectedTag
		supply_temp_switch 				= self.parent.getChild("Settings").getChild("SupplySwitches").getChild("temp_tag").props.params.selectedTag
		supply_flow_switch 				= self.parent.getChild("Settings").getChild("SupplySwitches").getChild("flow_tag").props.params.selectedTag
		supply_cond_switch 				= self.parent.getChild("Settings").getChild("SupplySwitches").getChild("cond_tag").props.params.selectedTag
		supply_press_switch 			= self.parent.getChild("Settings").getChild("SupplySwitches").getChild("press_tag").props.params.selectedTag
		return_temp_transmitter 		= self.parent.getChild("Settings").getChild("ReturnTransmitter").getChild("temp_tag").props.params.selectedTag
		return_flow_transmitter 		= self.parent.getChild("Settings").getChild("ReturnTransmitter").getChild("flow_tag").props.params.selectedTag
		return_cond_transmitter 		= self.parent.getChild("Settings").getChild("ReturnTransmitter").getChild("cond_tag").props.params.selectedTag
		return_press_transmitter 		= self.parent.getChild("Settings").getChild("ReturnTransmitter").getChild("press_tag").props.params.selectedTag
		return_temp_switch 				= self.parent.getChild("Settings").getChild("ReturnSwitches").getChild("temp_tag").props.params.selectedTag
		return_flow_switch 				= self.parent.getChild("Settings").getChild("ReturnSwitches").getChild("flow_tag").props.params.selectedTag
		return_cond_switch 				= self.parent.getChild("Settings").getChild("ReturnSwitches").getChild("cond_tag").props.params.selectedTag
		return_press_switch 			= self.parent.getChild("Settings").getChild("ReturnSwitches").getChild("press_tag").props.params.selectedTag
		type_sanitizer					= self.parent.getChild("Settings").getChild("Types").getChild("sanitizer_tag").props.params.selectedTag
		type_caustic					= self.parent.getChild("Settings").getChild("Types").getChild("caustic_tag").props.params.selectedTag
		type_acid						= self.parent.getChild("Settings").getChild("Types").getChild("acid_tag").props.params.selectedTag
		type_alkaline					= self.parent.getChild("Settings").getChild("Types").getChild("alkaline_tag").props.params.selectedTag
		cmd_advance						= self.parent.getChild("Settings").getChild("Commands").getChild("advance_tag").props.params.selectedTag
		cmd_hold						= self.parent.getChild("Settings").getChild("Commands").getChild("hold_tag").props.params.selectedTag
		cmd_pause						= self.parent.getChild("Settings").getChild("Commands").getChild("pause_tag").props.params.selectedTag
		cmd_resume						= self.parent.getChild("Settings").getChild("Commands").getChild("resume_tag").props.params.selectedTag
		
		# Check if exists
		namedQuery = "CIP_Q/DB_Scalar/Get_CIP_Line"
		parameters = {
			'system_id':		system_id,
			'name':				line_name,
		}
		
		exists = system.db.runNamedQuery(system.project.getProjectName(), namedQuery, parameters)
		
		if exists > 0 and edit == False:
			CORE_P.Utils.errorPopup('A line with that name already exists under the selected system.') 
			return
		
		if edit == False:
		
			namedQuery = "CIP_Q/DB_Insert/Insert_CIP_Line"
			parameters = {
		        'system_id': 					system_id, 
		        'name': 						line_name, 
		        'description': 				line_description,
		        'supply_temp_transmitter': 	supply_temp_transmitter if supply_temp_transmitter != '' else None,
		        'supply_flow_transmitter': 	supply_flow_transmitter if supply_flow_transmitter != '' else None,
		        'supply_cond_transmitter': 	supply_cond_transmitter if supply_cond_transmitter != '' else None,
		        'supply_press_transmitter': 	supply_press_transmitter if supply_press_transmitter != '' else None,
		        'supply_temp_switch': 			supply_temp_switch if supply_temp_switch != '' else None,
		        'supply_flow_switch': 			supply_flow_switch if supply_flow_switch != '' else None,
		        'supply_cond_switch': 			supply_cond_switch if supply_cond_switch != '' else None,
		        'supply_press_switch': 		supply_press_switch if supply_press_switch != '' else None,
		        'return_temp_transmitter': 	return_temp_transmitter if return_temp_transmitter != '' else None,
		        'return_flow_transmitter': 	return_flow_transmitter if return_flow_transmitter != '' else None,
		        'return_cond_transmitter': 	return_cond_transmitter if return_cond_transmitter != '' else None,
		        'return_press_transmitter': 	return_press_transmitter if return_press_transmitter != '' else None,
		        'return_temp_switch': 			return_temp_switch if return_temp_switch != '' else None,
		        'return_flow_switch': 			return_flow_switch if return_flow_switch != '' else None,
		        'return_cond_switch': 			return_cond_switch if return_cond_switch != '' else None,
		        'return_press_switch': 		return_press_switch if return_press_switch != '' else None,
		        'type_sanitizer': 				type_sanitizer if type_sanitizer != '' else None,
		        'type_caustic': 				type_caustic if type_caustic != '' else None,
		        'type_acid': 					type_acid if type_acid != '' else None,
		        'type_alkaline': 				type_alkaline if type_alkaline != '' else None,
		        'cmd_advance': 				cmd_advance if cmd_advance != '' else None,
		        'cmd_hold': 					cmd_hold if cmd_hold != '' else None,
		        'cmd_pause': 					cmd_pause if cmd_pause != '' else None,
		        'cmd_resume': 					cmd_resume if cmd_resume != '' else None,
		        'updated_by':					updated_by,
		    }
			
		else:
		
			namedQuery = "CIP_Q/DB_Update/Update_CIP_Line"
			parameters = {
				'id':							line_id,
				'system_id':					system_id,
				'name': 						line_name, 
		        'description': 				line_description,
		        'supply_temp_transmitter': 	supply_temp_transmitter if supply_temp_transmitter != '' else None,
		        'supply_flow_transmitter': 	supply_flow_transmitter if supply_flow_transmitter != '' else None,
		        'supply_cond_transmitter': 	supply_cond_transmitter if supply_cond_transmitter != '' else None,
		        'supply_press_transmitter': 	supply_press_transmitter if supply_press_transmitter != '' else None,
		        'supply_temp_switch': 			supply_temp_switch if supply_temp_switch != '' else None,
		        'supply_flow_switch': 			supply_flow_switch if supply_flow_switch != '' else None,
		        'supply_cond_switch': 			supply_cond_switch if supply_cond_switch != '' else None,
		        'supply_press_switch': 		supply_press_switch if supply_press_switch != '' else None,
		        'return_temp_transmitter': 	return_temp_transmitter if return_temp_transmitter != '' else None,
		        'return_flow_transmitter': 	return_flow_transmitter if return_flow_transmitter != '' else None,
		        'return_cond_transmitter': 	return_cond_transmitter if return_cond_transmitter != '' else None,
		        'return_press_transmitter': 	return_press_transmitter if return_press_transmitter != '' else None,
		        'return_temp_switch': 			return_temp_switch if return_temp_switch != '' else None,
		        'return_flow_switch': 			return_flow_switch if return_flow_switch != '' else None,
		        'return_cond_switch': 			return_cond_switch if return_cond_switch != '' else None,
		        'return_press_switch': 		return_press_switch if return_press_switch != '' else None,
		        'type_sanitizer': 				type_sanitizer if type_sanitizer != '' else None,
		        'type_caustic': 				type_caustic if type_caustic != '' else None,
		        'type_acid': 					type_acid if type_acid != '' else None,
		        'type_alkaline': 				type_alkaline if type_alkaline != '' else None,
		        'cmd_advance': 				cmd_advance if cmd_advance != '' else None,
		        'cmd_hold': 					cmd_hold if cmd_hold != '' else None,
		        'cmd_pause': 					cmd_pause if cmd_pause != '' else None,
		        'cmd_resume': 					cmd_resume if cmd_resume != '' else None,
		        'updated_by':					updated_by,
			}
			
		affected_rows = system.db.runNamedQuery(system.project.getProjectName(), namedQuery, parameters,tx=txId)
		
		message =  'Added/Edited CIP Line:' + str(parameters)
		
		# Audit log
		CORE_P.Utils.logChanges(self, 'AddEditCIPLine', message, txId=txId, site_id=site_id)
		system.db.commitTransaction(txId)
	
		# Update the table with lines 
		system.perspective.sendMessage("update_bindings", payload = {}, scope = "page")
	
		CORE_P.Utils.showSuccess(self, "Saved!") 
		system.perspective.closePopup('')
		system.db.closeTransaction(txId)
	    
	except:
		system.db.rollbackTransaction(txId)
		system.db.closeTransaction(txId)
		CORE_P.Utils.errorPopup('Error adding/editing CIP Line:')

# Get all the parameters we need to delete
	
	line_id 		= self.view.params.line_id
	site_id			= self.view.params.site_id

	txId = system.db.beginTransaction(timeout=5000)

	try:

		namedQuery = "CIP_Q/DB_Delete/Delete_CIP_Line"
		parameters = {
			'id':			line_id
		}
			

		affected_rows = system.db.runNamedQuery(system.project.getProjectName(), namedQuery, parameters,tx=txId)
		
		message =  'Deleted CIP Line:' + str(parameters)
		
		# Audit log
		CORE_P.Utils.logChanges(self, 'DeleteCIPLine',message,txId=txId,site_id=site_id)
		system.db.commitTransaction(txId)
                        			
		# Update the table with lines 
		system.perspective.sendMessage("update_bindings", payload = {}, scope = "page")

		CORE_P.Utils.showSuccess(self, "Deleted!") 
		
		self.props.value=0
		system.db.closeTransaction(txId)
		system.perspective.closePopup('')

	except:
		system.db.rollbackTransaction(txId)
		system.db.closeTransaction(txId)
		self.props.value=0
		CORE_P.Utils.errorPopup('Error deleting CIP Line:') #  + str(sys.exc_info())
